data.title: Marcel van Eeden: Tekeningen / Zeichnungen / Drawings / Dibujos, 1993-2003
data.meta_description: Nürnberg: Verlag für moderne Kunst, 2003 1st Edition. Soft cover. First edition, first printing. Soft cover. Photographically illustrated French-fold wrappers; no dust jacket as issued. Drawings by Marcel van Eeden. Text in Dutch, German, English and Spanish. Essays by Roel Arkesteijn, Cornel Bierens and Diedrich Diederichsen. Includes an exhibition history and a bibliography. 224 pp., profusely illustrated in
data.text:
Specifics

First edition, first printing. Soft cover. Photographically illustrated French-fold wrappers; no dust jacket as issued. Drawings by Marcel van Eeden. Text in Dutch, German, English and Spanish. Essays by Roel Arkesteijn, Cornel Bierens and Diedrich Diederichsen. Includes an exhibition history and a bibliography. 224 pp., profusely illustrated in black-and-white. 9-1/2 x 6-1/4 inches. Published on the occasion of exhibitions at GEM, Den Haag, and CGAC, Santiago de Compostela.

Condition

Fine.
